special_abilities.name: Unarmored Defense.
special_abilities.desc: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack.
actions.desc: The adept makes three unarmed strikes or three dart attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the adept can choose one of the following additional effects:

actions.name: Dart.
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Deflect Missile.
reactions.desc: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, the adept deflects the missile. The damage it takes from the attack is reduced by 1d10 + 3. If the damage is reduced to 0, the adept catches the missile if itâ€™s small enough to hold in one hand and the adept has a hand free.
